---
title: Data Cleaning
format: typst
---
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

raw_path   <- "data/g24_sov_by_g24_svprec.csv"
clean_path <- "data/g24_sov_by_g24_svprec_clean.csv"

g24_raw <- read_csv(raw_path, show_col_types = FALSE)

glimpse(g24_raw)
summary(g24_raw)

g24_clean <- g24_raw |>
  mutate(
    COUNTY   = as.character(COUNTY),
    SVPREC_KEY    = as.character(SVPREC_KEY),
    TOTVOTES    = as.integer(TOTALVOTES),
       )

glimpse(g24_clean)
write_csv(g24_clean, clean_path)
clean_path
